Header.title: Jerboa Pool
Header.paragraph: A Fully Community Focused Validator on the Crypto.org Chain. 0% Fee in 2021!

About.paragraph: Founded in 2021, Jerboa Technologies is a Custum Software Development company based in the southern United States. Our passion for blockchain technology has brought us into the position to be able to have an impact on future usage/development on the Crypto.org Chain. Jerboa Pool is fully community focused, and backed by a network of security fail-safes and procedures to keep validation as accurate as possible.

Services.name: Discord Community
Services.text: Join our growing Discord community for important updates on all things Jerboa Pool!

Services.name: Twitter
Services.text: Follow us on Twitter for important updates straight to your phone!

Services.name: Jerboa Technologies, LLC
Services.text: Get more information on our company and contact us for any potential partnerships!
